page.title: 12Leisure Activities
page.content: We did a survey to find out what the people who live in do their leisure time.Amongst children we found that the most popular pastimes were watching television and going swimming but a lot of children also said that they liked fishing,cycling and playing games.The most popular sport was football,followed by tennis,cricket and athletics.Almost half of the children we asked belonged to an organisation like Cubs or Brownies and many of them had pets or played a musical instrument. Adults chose watching television and watching sport as popular pastimes,and shopping,gardening,listening to music and going to a public house or club were also chosen.Many people like decorating as an activity.Very few people were involved with fund-raising or church activities.
